readable.title: 3677302645_8cd3fac70d
readable.content: A guy in a costume , a crowd watching him . A man standing in front of a crowd . A performer putting on an act in front of a large crowd of people . A person wearing a black coat and a helmet with spiky things is posing on the lawn in front of a crowd of people . one person performing a show in front of a large audience sitting on the lawn
